page.title: 19CHANGES
page.content:
There was a lot of disturbance about the car park outside Barnham Station and the supermarket. Ian Lightbody of the council supports the motion that about 75 spaces are all that would be needed to make a large car park. The local parish agreed to the idea and sent a letter of approval to the council.This road along with the railway would also create jobs.A suggestion was put forward by Mrs Ruthward that a junior parish council should be formed. This idea was supported by Mr David Hodgson. Both of these councillors are going to speak to local headmasters about it.
Written by Julie Feast.
